NK040(thi)024:1: // mkha' 'gro sde lnga'i mngon rtogs bzhugs pa lags so //
NK040(thi)024:2: sku bzhi'i bdag nyid yum chen dang //
NK040(thi)024:3: dbyer med mkha' 'gro'i zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas //
NK040(thi)024:4: de yi bsgrub mchod tshogs las rim pa dang //
NK040(thi)024:5: bdag nyid rgyud dbang lam du byed pa'i tshul //
NK040(thi)024:6: dad ldan slob mas yang yang bskul ba'i ngor //
NK040(thi)024:7: phyag len bzhin du gus pas bris pa yis //
NK040(thi)024:8: bla ma mkha' 'gro'i tshogs kyis bzod mdzod cing //
NK040(thi)024:9: slar yang brtse ba'i thugs kyis byin gyis rlobs //
NK040(thi)024:10: stegs bu gang yang rung ba la tshom bu lnga bkod //
NK040(thi)024:11: mchod pa'i 'tshogs chas ci 'byor pa dang //
NK040(thi)024:16: badz+ra a mri ta kun+d+ha li ha 2na ha na h'u phata /
NK040(thi)024:18: +aah4 las thod pa dkar po yangs shing rgya che ba'i nang du /
NK040(thi)024:21: 1 las sha lnga bdud rtsi lnga /
NK040(thi)024:22: gtor ma zhes brjod 2la bgegs sbyangs //
NK040(thi)024:24: gtor 4ma la lag pa g.yas bstan te //
NK040(thi)024:26: yi ge lngas yongs su gang bar gyur /
NK040(thi)024:28: ho las 'dod yon phun sum tshogs pa'i bdud rtsir gyur /
NK040(thi)024:30: +aahmh'u ha ho h+r+aih phem phem badz+ra a ra li hoh 'bar ba'i phyag /
NK040(thi)024:31: zhes brjod pas ye shes kyi bdud rtsir bya khyung gi phyag rgya dang /
NK040(thi)024:32: rgya dpral ba g.yon du bskor zhing /
NK040(thi)024:33: dzahmh'u bam hoh badz+ra thal mo kha gyen du phyes la /
NK040(thi)024:34: d+ha ki ni sa ma ya s+t+wam /
NK040(thi)024:35: dri sh+ya hoh rdo rje thod pa'i phyag rgya dang /
NK040(thi)024:36: kha kha kh+aa hi kh+aa hi sarba yak+sha rak+sha /
NK040(thi)024:37: sarba bud+d+ha sre ta sha tsa /
NK040(thi)024:40: da ka d+aak+ki ni ta ya /
NK040(thi)024:41: i dam b+ha lim ta g+h+ri h+na du /
NK040(thi)024:44: ma mkha' 'gro ma la sogs pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa byon nas /
NK040(thi)024:45: gtor ma gsol bar bsam zhing /
NK040(thi)024:46: rdo rje thal mo gsum mam bdun gyis 'bul /
NK040(thi)024:47: ma sarba sid+d+hi me yad tsan+d+hu /
NK040(thi)024:54: sad su kham b+hi shud+d+ha ya s+w+aa h+aa /
NK040(thi)024:55: i ka b+ha wan+tu h'u h'u phata phata s+w+aa h+aa /
NK040(thi)024:56: ma h+aa ar+g+ham la sogs pas mchod la /
NK040(thi)024:57: mi bskyod rdo rje ye shes che //
NK040(thi)024:58: rdo rje dbyings ni mkha' chen po //
NK040(thi)024:59: rdo rje gsum mchog dkyil 'khor gsum //
NK040(thi)024:61: rnam par snang mdzad dag pa che //
NK040(thi)024:62: rdo rje zhi ba dga' chen po //
NK040(thi)024:63: rang bzhin gyi ni 'od gsal mchog /
NK040(thi)024:65: rin chen rgyal po rab tu zab //
NK040(thi)024:66: rdo rje nam mkha' dri ma med //
NK040(thi)024:67: rang bzhin dag pa gos pa med //
NK040(thi)024:69: rdo rje dpag med rgyal po che //
NK040(thi)024:70: mi rtog rdo rje nam mkha'i dbyings //
NK040(thi)024:71: 'dod chags pha rol phyin pa brnyes //
NK040(thi)024:73: don yod rdo rje rdzogs sangs rgyas //
NK040(thi)024:74: bsam pa thams cad rdzogs mdzad pa //
NK040(thi)024:75: dngos nyid dag pa nyid las byung //
NK040(thi)024:79: lha chen brgyad po 'khor dang bcas //
NK040(thi)024:80: klu chen brgyad po 'khor dang bcas //
NK040(thi)024:81: gza' chen brgyad po 'khor dang bcas //
NK040(thi)024:82: 'jig rten skyong ba brgyad po dang //
NK040(thi)024:83: gnod sbyin tshogs rnams ma lus dang //
NK040(thi)024:84: srin po'i tshogs rnams ma lus dang //
NK040(thi)024:86: 'byung po'i tshogs yid btags sha za'i smyo byed rjed
NK040(thi)024:87: byed mkha' 'gro'i ma mo'i tshogs de la sogs te
NK040(thi)024:88: 'byung po'i tshogs // ma lus ci snyed yod pa dang //
NK040(thi)024:89: 'dir gshegs bdag la dgongs su gsol //
NK040(thi)024:90: mchod sbyin gtor ma 'di bsnams la //
NK040(thi)024:92: nad med tshe dang dbang phyug dang //
NK040(thi)024:93: dpal dang grags dang skal bar bzang //
NK040(thi)024:94: longs spyod rgya chen kun thob cing //
NK040(thi)024:95: zhi dang rgyas la sogs pa yi //
NK040(thi)024:96: las kyi dngos grub bdag la stsol //
NK040(thi)024:97: dam tshig can gyis bdag la srungs //
NK040(thi)024:98: dngos grub can gyi sdong grogs mdzod //
NK040(thi)024:99: dus min 'chi ba'i nad rnams dang //
NK040(thi)024:100: gdon dang bgegs rnams med par mdzod //
NK040(thi)024:101: rmi lam ngan dang mtshan ma ngan //
NK040(thi)024:102: bya byed ngan pa med par mdzod //
NK040(thi)024:103: 'jig rten bde zhing lo legs dang //
NK040(thi)024:105: bde legs thams cad 'byung ba dang //
NK040(thi)024:107: dkar po'i rigs bstan pa la mngon par dga' ba rnams /
NK040(thi)024:108: mchod sbyin gyi gtor ma 'dis tshims par gyis la /
NK040(thi)024:109: bdag gis dkyil 'khor gyi bya ba ma tshar bar du sdong grogs mdzod cig /
NK040(thi)024:110: dkyil 'khor chen po la blta ba dang nyan pa
NK040(thi)024:111: las mi dbang ba'i bgegs dang log par 'dren pa
NK040(thi)024:112: thams cad gtor ma 'dis tshim par gyis la 'dir
NK040(thi)024:113: ma gnas par gzhan du songs shig /
NK040(thi)024:116: sum+b+ha ni h'u zhes brjod la bgegs bskrad /
NK040(thi)024:117: ma song ba srid na bka' bsgo zhing mtshams bcad pa ni /
NK040(thi)024:119: nyon cig bgegs dang log 'dren tshogs //
NK040(thi)024:122: rdo rje mkha' 'gro khros pa yi //
NK040(thi)024:123: rdo rje 'bar ba'i mtshon cha yin //
NK040(thi)024:124: lus ngag yid gsum rdul du rlog /
NK040(thi)024:127: nyon cig bgegs dang log 'dren tshogs //
NK040(thi)024:128: gnas 'dir gal te mi sangs rgyas mkha' 'gro 'khor
NK040(thi)024:129: lo 'bar ba'i lus ngag yid gsum bud+d+ha d+aak+ki ni
NK040(thi)024:131: nyon cig bgegs dang log 'dren tshogs //
NK040(thi)024:134: rin chen mkha' 'gro khros pa yi //
NK040(thi)024:135: rin chen 'bar ba'i mtshon cha yin //
NK040(thi)024:136: lus ngag yid gsum rdul du rlog /
NK040(thi)024:139: nyon cig bgegs dang log 'dren tshogs //
NK040(thi)024:140: gnas 'dir gal te pad+ma mkha' 'gro khros dgra s+t+wa
NK040(thi)024:141: 'bar ba'i lus ngag yid gsum pad+ma d+aak+ki ni h'u
NK040(thi)024:142: phata / h'u nyon cig bgegs gnas 'dir gal te
NK040(thi)024:143: las kyi mkha' 'gro khros ral gri'i 'bar ba'i lus
NK040(thi)024:144: ngag yid karma d+aak+ki ni h'u phata /
NK040(thi)024:146: srid pa'i rtse mo man chod dang //
NK040(thi)024:147: na rag dmyal khams yan chad du //
NK040(thi)024:148: log par lta ba'i dgra dang bgegs //
NK040(thi)024:151: zhes sogs brjod nas bgegs med par bya /
NK040(thi)024:152: bdag tu bzung ba mtshon cha lnga'i gur khang ni /
NK040(thi)024:154: steng yang rdo rje'i bla re la //
NK040(thi)024:155: 'og kyang rdo rje'i sa gzhi ste //
NK040(thi)024:157: rdo rje'i mtshams las ma 'da' zhig /
NK040(thi)024:158: badz+ra rak+sha rak+sha h'u phata s+w+aa h+aa /
NK040(thi)024:160: steng yang 'khor lo'i bla 'og kyang 'khor lo'i sa
NK040(thi)024:161: phyogs mtshams 'khor lo 'khor lo'i mtshams badz+ra tsakra tsakra
NK040(thi)024:162: rak+sha h'u / steng yang dbyugs pa'i 'og kyang dbyug
NK040(thi)024:163: pa'i sa phyogs mtshams dbyug pa'i dbyug pa'i mtshams dan+t+ra
NK040(thi)024:164: rak+sha h'u / rak+sha h'u / steng yang dgra s+t+wa'i
NK040(thi)024:165: bla 'og kyang dgra s+t+wa'i sa phyogs mtshams dgra s+t+wa'i
NK040(thi)024:166: dgra s+t+wa'i mtshams pa ra shu rak+sha h'u steng yang
NK040(thi)024:167: ral gri'i bla 'og kyang ral gri'i sa phyogs mtshams
NK040(thi)024:168: ral gri'i ral gri'i mtshams kharga rak+sha h'u /
NK040(thi)024:170: bdud dpung nges par bsreg mdzad pa //
NK040(thi)024:171: sa dang nam mkha' gang ba yi //
NK040(thi)024:172: 'bar ba me yi phung por gyur //
NK040(thi)024:173: badz+ra dz+wa la ram badz+ra dz+wa la rak+sha rak+sha h'u h'u h'u phata s+w+aa h+aa /
NK040(thi)024:174: de nas gnas dang yo byad byin gyis brlab pa ni /
NK040(thi)024:175: badz+ra a mri ta kun+d+ha li ha na ha na h'u phata /
NK040(thi)024:176: s+w+aa b+ha was stong par gyur /
NK040(thi)024:177: stong pa'i ngang las lha rdzas las grub pa'i gzhal yas khang gi phyi nang kun tu /
NK040(thi)024:178: a las ye shes kyi ka p+aa la yangs shing
NK040(thi)024:179: rgya che ba'i nang du +aahmh'u zhu ba las lha
NK040(thi)024:180: rdzas las grub pa'i mchod yon /
NK040(thi)024:187: rol mo'i sgra la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa'
NK040(thi)024:188: kun tu bzang po'i rnam par thar pa las byung
NK040(thi)024:189: ba'i mchod sprin bsam gyis mi khyab par gyur /
NK040(thi)024:190: gu ru d+aak+ki ni ar+g+ham pra tits+tsha ye s+w+aa h+aa /
NK040(thi)024:191: p+aad+yam pra tits+tsha ye s+w+aa h+aa /
NK040(thi)024:193: rdu pe a lo ke g+han+d+he ne bi te shap+da +aahmh'u /
NK040(thi)024:195: dang po gnas dang yo byad byin gyis brlabs /
NK040(thi)024:196: bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro sprin gtibs pa bzhin byon nas /
NK040(thi)024:198: sam pra pra ra ni ta /
NK040(thi)024:202: na ta sam b+ha we ta /
NK040(thi)024:204: son+ta sha ni h'u h'u h'u /
NK040(thi)024:208: rol mo'i sgra drag tu byas pas /
NK040(thi)024:209: gzhal yas khang du mchod rdzas du ma spros pas /
NK040(thi)024:210: bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro srung ma rgyal mtsho'i
NK040(thi)024:211: tshogs dang bcas pas nam mkha' gang bar byon nas
NK040(thi)024:212: / de dag la nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i sems thams cad thun mong dang /
NK040(thi)024:213: thun mong ma yin pa'i skyabs 'gro yan lag brgyad pa gdan thog gcig ma ltar bya /
NK040(thi)024:214: sems can thams cad kyi don du rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thob par bya /
NK040(thi)024:215: de'i ched du zab mo'i tshogs kyi las la 'jug par bgyis /
NK040(thi)024:217: rang gi spyi bor pad+ma dang zla ba'i steng du /
NK040(thi)024:218: h'u las bla ma dam pa rdo rje sems dpa' sku mdog dkar po zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa /
NK040(thi)024:220: g.yon pas dril bu 'dzin pa yum la 'khyud pa /
NK040(thi)024:221: zhabs rdo rje'i skyil krung du bzhugs pa'i pang na /
NK040(thi)024:222: yum rdo rje snyem ma dkar mo gri gug dang thod khrag 'dzin pas yab la 'khyud cing /
NK040(thi)024:224: gnyis ka yang rus pa dang rin po ches brgyan pa'i dpral bar /
NK040(thi)024:226: de las 'od zer 'phros pas bla ma dang sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' thams cad /
NK040(thi)024:227: dzahmh'u bam hoh gnyis su med par bstim /
NK040(thi)024:229: bla mas bdag gi lus ngag yid gsum gyi sdig
NK040(thi)024:230: sgrib rtsa ba yan lag gi dam tshig chag nyams
NK040(thi)024:231: thams cad dag par mdzad du gsol /
NK040(thi)024:233: yum gyi sbyor mtshams nas bdud rtsi babs pas lus
NK040(thi)024:234: phyi nang gi sdig sgrib sgo gsum gyi nyes ltung
NK040(thi)024:236: tshangs bug nas lus sems dkar mer gyis gang bar bsam zhing /
NK040(thi)024:240: badz+ra he ru ka t+we no pa tish+tha /
NK040(thi)024:242: su to n+yo me b+ha wa /
NK040(thi)024:243: a nu rak+to me b+ha wa /
NK040(thi)024:247: tsit+tam sh+re yam ku ru h'u /
NK040(thi)024:248: ha ha ha ha hoh b+ha ga wana /
NK040(thi)024:251: ma h+aa sa ma ya sa t+wa +aa mthar phata ces ci nus /
NK040(thi)024:254: bdag ni mi shes rmongs pa yis //
NK040(thi)024:255: dam tshig la ni 'gal zhing nyams //
NK040(thi)024:256: bla ma mgon pos skyabs mdzod cig /
NK040(thi)024:257: gtso bo rdo rje 'dzin pa ste //
NK040(thi)024:258: thugs rje chen po'i bdag nyid can //
NK040(thi)024:259: 'gro ba'i gtso la bdag skyabs mchi //
NK040(thi)024:261: zhes brjod pas rdo rje sems dpa' yab yum 'od du zhu nas rang la thim /
NK040(thi)024:262: rang nyid skad cig gis pad+ma dang nyi ma'i steng du /
NK040(thi)024:263: rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma sku mdog sngon mo /
NK040(thi)024:264: de'i thugs kar a sngon po las 'od zer 'phros /
NK040(thi)024:266: phyir 'phros pas chos kyi dbyings kyi pho brang nas /
NK040(thi)024:267: mkha' 'gro sde lnga 'khor dang bcas pa la bla ma mi bskyod pas dbu brgyan pa /
NK040(thi)024:268: badz+ra sa ma ya dza dza dzah mchod sprin gyis
NK040(thi)024:269: spras pa'i gzhal yas khang gi pad nyi'i steng du
NK040(thi)024:270: bzhugs par bsam / rang rang gi lus dpag tu med pa sprul la /
NK040(thi)024:271: bla ma'i zhabs la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK040(thi)024:272: na mo rat+na gu ru b+h+yah yi dam la phyag bya /
NK040(thi)024:273: na mo d+ha ki ni ma d+ha la b+h+yah rang
NK040(thi)024:274: gi thugs ka nas mchod pa ni lha mos mchod
NK040(thi)024:275: rdzas dpag tu med pa thogs nas grangs med pas
NK040(thi)024:276: dal gyi lha tshogs la mchod par bsam zhing /
NK040(thi)024:277: ma h+aa gu ru sa pa ri wa ra ar+g+ham la sogs pas mchod /
NK040(thi)024:278: dkon mchog gsum la brgyud nas gsungs /
NK040(thi)024:279: bdag skyabs rang rang phyag rgya dang so so'i bcas pas /
NK040(thi)024:281: sdig pa mi dge so sor bshags //
NK040(thi)024:282: 'gro ba'i dge la rjes yi rangs //
NK040(thi)024:283: sangs rgyas byang chub yid kyis bzungs //
NK040(thi)024:284: sangs rgyas chos dang tshogs mchog la //
NK040(thi)024:285: byang chub bar du skyabs su 'chi //
NK040(thi)024:286: rang gzhan don ni rab bsgrubs phyir //
NK040(thi)024:287: byang chub sems ni bskyed par bgyi //
NK040(thi)024:288: byang chub mchog tu sems ni bskyed bgyis nas //
NK040(thi)024:289: sems can thams cad bdag gis mgron du gnyer //
NK040(thi)024:290: byang chub spyod mchog yid 'ong spyad bar bgyi //
NK040(thi)024:291: 'gro la phan phyir sangs rgyas 'grub par shog /
NK040(thi)024:292: ces lan gsum gyis rgyun bshags skyabs 'gro sems bskyed dang rgyud sam bu tri nas /
NK040(thi)024:293: sangs rgyas sras bcas thams cad dang //
NK040(thi)024:294: dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma rnams kun //
NK040(thi)024:295: thams cad bdag la dgongs su gsol //
NK040(thi)024:296: bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba yis //
NK040(thi)024:297: dus 'di nas ni bzung nas su //
NK040(thi)024:298: ji srid snying po byang chub bar //
NK040(thi)024:299: ji ltar dus gsum mgon po rnams //
NK040(thi)024:300: byang chub tu ni nges mdzad pa //
NK040(thi)024:301: byang chub sems ni bla na med //
NK040(thi)024:302: dam pa bdag gis bskyed par bgyi //
NK040(thi)024:303: tshul khrims kyi ni bslab pa dang //
NK040(thi)024:304: dge ba'i chos ni sdud pa dang //
NK040(thi)024:305: sems can don byed tshul khrims gsum //
NK040(thi)024:306: so sor brtan por bzung bar bgyi //
NK040(thi)024:307: sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun te //
NK040(thi)024:308: bla na med pa'i dkon mchog gsum //
NK040(thi)024:309: sangs rgyas rnal 'byor las skyes pas //
NK040(thi)024:310: sdom pa deng nas bzung bar bgyi //
NK040(thi)024:311: rdo rje rigs mchog chen po la //
NK040(thi)024:312: rdo rje dril bu'i phyag rgya dang //
NK040(thi)024:313: yang dag nyid du bzung bar bgyi //
NK040(thi)024:314: slob dpon dag kyang bzung bar bgyi //
NK040(thi)024:315: rin chen rigs mchog chen po yi //
NK040(thi)024:316: dam tshig yid du 'ong ba yis //
NK040(thi)024:317: nyin re bzhin du dus drug la //
NK040(thi)024:318: sbyin pa rnam bzhi rtag tu sbyin //
NK040(thi)024:319: byang chub chen po las byung ba'i //
NK040(thi)024:320: pad+ma'i rigs mchog dag pa la //
NK040(thi)024:321: phyi nang gsang ba'i theg pa gsum //
NK040(thi)024:322: dam pa'i chos ni ma lus bzung //
NK040(thi)024:323: las kyi rigs mchog chen po la //
NK040(thi)024:324: sdom pa thams cad ldan pa ni //
NK040(thi)024:325: yang dag nyid du bzung bar bgyi //
NK040(thi)024:326: mchod pa'i las kyang ci nus bgyi //
NK040(thi)024:327: byang chub sems ni bla med mchog /
NK040(thi)024:328: dam pa bdag gis bskyed bgyis nas //
NK040(thi)024:329: sems can kun gyi don gyi phyir //
NK040(thi)024:330: bdag gis sdom pa ma lus bzung //
NK040(thi)024:331: ma bsgral ba rnams bdag gi bsgral //
NK040(thi)024:332: ma grol ba rnams bdag gis grol //
NK040(thi)024:333: dbugs ma dbyung ba rnams dbugs dbyung zhing //
NK040(thi)024:335: rigs lnga spyi dang khyad par sdom pa bzung nas /
NK040(thi)024:337: sems can byams pa thams cad bde ba dang bde ba'i rgyu dang ldan par gyur cig /
NK040(thi)024:338: sdug bsngal snying rje dang sdug bsngal gyi rgyu dang bral bar gyur cig /
NK040(thi)024:339: sdug bsngal dga' ba med pa'i bde ba dang mi 'bral bar gyur cig /
NK040(thi)024:340: btang snyoms dgra gnyen nye ring chags sdang med pa'i btang snyoms chen po dang ldan par gyur cig /
NK040(thi)024:341: tshad med pa bzhi bsgom pa ni /
NK040(thi)024:342: bsod nams kyi tshogs bsags pa'o //
NK040(thi)024:343: swa d+harma'i sngags brjod pas chos thams cad stong par bsam pa ni bsod nams kyi tshogs bsags pa'o //
NK040(thi)024:344: b+h+aa wa shud+d+ho sarba d+har+m+aa sogs /
NK040(thi)024:345: badz+ra a mri ta kun+d+ha li swa b+h+aa wa stong pa nyid du gyur /
NK040(thi)024:346: stong pa'i ngang las pam las pad+ma /
NK040(thi)024:347: ram las nyi ma'i steng du h'u las sna tshogs rdo rje shar dkar /
NK040(thi)024:351: lte ba sngon po h'u gis mtshan pa las 'od zer phyogs bcur 'phros pas /
NK040(thi)024:353: tha ma rdo rje'i ra ba dang d+r+wa ba /
NK040(thi)024:354: steng rdo rje'i gur dang bla re /
NK040(thi)024:355: de dag gi phyi rol du mad'i dra ba mig
NK040(thi)024:356: mang ris su bris pa'i phyi rol du ye shes
NK040(thi)024:357: kyi me 'bar bas bskor ba'i bsrung 'khor yangs shing
NK040(thi)024:358: rgya che ba / badz+ra rak+sha rak+sha h'u h'u h'u phata phata phata s+w+aa h+aa /
NK040(thi)024:359: zhes lan gsum bsgoms pas bsrung 'khor brtan par bya /
NK040(thi)024:360: de'i nang du e las chos kyi gzhi'i yan lag /
NK040(thi)024:363: gru gsum chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid rnam thar sgo gsum mtshon /
NK040(thi)024:364: phyi dkar thabs la nang dmar shes rab ba gdengs
NK040(thi)024:365: kha chen po gyen du phyogs sangs rgyas kyi yon
NK040(thi)024:366: tan gong nas gong du 'phel ba /
NK040(thi)024:368: rtsa ba snying rje chen pos sems can gyi don mdzad pa /
NK040(thi)024:369: phra ba mthur du zug pa'i nang du skye ba sbyong ba /
NK040(thi)024:370: yam las rlung ljang nag zla gam yam gyis mtshan pa /
NK040(thi)024:371: ram las me dal gru gsum dmar pa ram gyis mtshan pa /
NK040(thi)024:372: bam dal dkar po bam gyis mtshan pa /
NK040(thi)024:374: lam gru bzhi ser po lam gyi mtshan pa /
NK040(thi)024:376: de'i steng du sum yon tan dang phrin las rdzogs pas sems can gyi don byed pa dang /
NK040(thi)024:377: las ri rab kyi steng du /
NK040(thi)024:378: b+h+r+aum rnam snang gi ngo bo /
NK040(thi)024:379: las rin po che sna tshogs las grub pa'i zhal
NK040(thi)024:380: yas khang gru bzhi sgo bzhi kha khyer bzhi dang
NK040(thi)024:381: bcas pa / nang nas rim pa bzhin du nag po /
NK040(thi)024:389: dkar po'i me long lta bu'i ye shes /
NK040(thi)024:390: rtsig pa rim pa sbyor lam dbang po lnga dang stobs /
NK040(thi)024:392: rtsig tshogs lam bzhi gsum bcu gnyis /
NK040(thi)024:393: pa'i steng du rin po che' pha gu ser po /
NK040(thi)024:394: d+r+wa ba dang dra phyed pas 'phyangs pa'i steng du
NK040(thi)024:395: rin po che rnam par spel ba'i mda' yab dang
NK040(thi)024:396: / pu shu mchod rten gyi rnam par mdzes par byas pa /
NK040(thi)024:397: rtsigs pa'i phyi rol du 'dod yon gyi snam bu
NK040(thi)024:398: dmar po la mchod pa'i lha mo bcu gnyis mchod
NK040(thi)024:401: nang ka 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa /
NK040(thi)024:403: rdo rje'i gdung bzhis mig mang ris su bris shing
NK040(thi)024:404: mdzes par phub pa'i dbus phyur bu zlum por mi
NK040(thi)024:405: slob pa'i lam rang don dam pa'i sangs rgyas spros
NK040(thi)024:406: pa thams cad dang bral ba /
NK040(thi)024:408: rdo rje phyed pa nor bu rin po ches mtshan pa /
NK040(thi)024:409: sgo'i thad so bzhir ka ba bzhi bzhis btegs pa'i
NK040(thi)024:410: rta babs rim pa bzhi bzhi dang ldan pa'i steng
NK040(thi)024:411: du / pad+ma la gnas pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo dang /
NK040(thi)024:412: gdugs byang chub kyi yan lag bdun /
NK040(thi)024:413: dang ri dwags dang gos dang phan dang /
NK040(thi)024:416: rnga yab nor bu'i yu ba can la sogs pa rgyan du mas brgyan pa /
NK040(thi)024:417: dwangs shing thogs pa med pa'i phyir rol tu /
NK040(thi)024:418: dur khrod chen po brgyad kyis yongs su bskor ba'i
NK040(thi)024:419: gzhal sbyong byed mya ngan las 'das pa'i chos rnams
NK040(thi)024:425: dbus su pad+ma dmar ba'am sna tshogs pad+ma /
NK040(thi)024:426: 'dab ma bzhi pa'i lte ba dang 'dab ma rnams su a las zla khu ba ba /
NK040(thi)024:427: ram las nyi rak+ta dang ma dang /
NK040(thi)024:429: dbus su a yig sngon po /
NK040(thi)024:432: gti mug me long ye shes /
NK040(thi)024:434: nga rgyal mnyam nyid ye shes /
NK040(thi)024:437: byang ljang khu phrag dog bya grub ye shes /
NK040(thi)024:438: de rnams yongs su gyur pa las /
NK040(thi)024:439: gri gug rang rang gi mdog can as mtshan pa
NK040(thi)024:440: las 'od 'phros sems can gyi don sdig sgrib dag
NK040(thi)024:441: mkha' 'gro sde lnga'i go 'phang la bkod /
NK040(thi)024:442: byas 'phags pa mchod mchod sprin bsam gyis mi khyab pas mchod par bsam /
NK040(thi)024:443: tshul 'dus yongs su gyur pa las /
NK040(thi)024:444: dbus rnam par shes pa'i phung po chu dag pa mi bskyed pa'i ngo bo /
NK040(thi)024:445: su rang nyid rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma sku mdog sngon po /
NK040(thi)024:446: shar khams brgyad zhe sdang chos nyid las 'gyur ba
NK040(thi)024:447: med pa gzugs phung nam mkha' dag pa rnam snang
NK040(thi)024:448: / du sangs rgyas mkha' 'gro sku mdog dkar mo /
NK040(thi)024:449: lhor rang bzhin sa dag pa tshor ba'i phung po dag pa rin 'byung /
NK040(thi)024:450: rin chen mkha' 'gro sku mdog ser mo /
NK040(thi)024:451: nub tu 'du shes me dag pas snying rje sems can la chags shing dbang gi las 'grub /
NK040(thi)024:452: pad+ma mkha' 'gro sku mdog dmar mo /
NK040(thi)024:453: byang du las kyi mkha' 'gro 'du byed rlung dag
NK040(thi)024:454: pas phrin las sna tshogs kyis don sgrub cing drag
NK040(thi)024:455: po'i las / sku mdog ljang khu /
NK040(thi)024:456: thams cad kyang zhal gcig chos nyid de bzhin nyid du rol gcig pa /
NK040(thi)024:457: phyag gnyis thabs shes zung du 'jug pas spyan khams
NK040(thi)024:458: gsum gzigs shing dus gsum gyi dngos po mkhyen pa
NK040(thi)024:460: zhal snying rjes sems can rjes su 'dzin cing tshad med bzhi dang ldan pa /
NK040(thi)024:461: cung zad gdangs shing mche ba gtsegs pa /
NK040(thi)024:462: dbu skra nag po sil mar gyur pas sku rgyab
NK040(thi)024:463: non pa phyag g.yas pas gri gug nam mkha' 'phyar
NK040(thi)024:464: ba / nga rgyal la sogs pa'i skyon drug bcad pa /
NK040(thi)024:465: g.yon pas thod khrag zag med kyi bde ba dang ldan pas /
NK040(thi)024:467: gru mo nang na yab kyi ngo bo dang kha
NK040(thi)024:468: t+w+aam kha yod pa tshangs pa'i skud pa dang thabs
NK040(thi)024:470: 'khor 'das thams cad chos nyid du 'dres pas dung chen gyi phreng ba mchod phyir thogs pa /
NK040(thi)024:471: mi mgo skam po lnga rigs lngas lngas dbu brgyan cing /
NK040(thi)024:472: rlon pa lnga a li ka li lnga bcu /
NK040(thi)024:474: 'khor lo bsam gtan rna cha bzod pa gdu bu tshul khrims mgul rgyan /
NK040(thi)024:476: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
NK040(thi)024:477: sku reg ste rus pa'i rgyan lngas sbyin sogs thabs pha rol tu phyin pa lnga dag pas /
NK040(thi)024:479: zhabs g.yas mya ngan las 'das pa'i mtha' dang /
NK040(thi)024:480: bskum pa'i rting pa b+ha gar gtad cing /
NK040(thi)024:481: g.yon brkyangs nas gar thabs su bzhugs pa /
NK040(thi)024:482: dwangs shing gsal la nyi ma 'bum gyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin la /
NK040(thi)024:485: kyi me 'bar ba'i dbus na 'khor ba'i mtha' mnan pa bzhugs pa /
NK040(thi)024:486: de dag thams cad dpral bar /
NK040(thi)024:487: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sku rdo rje'i ngo bo /
NK040(thi)024:488: mgrin par +aah gsung rdo rje'i ngo bo /
NK040(thi)024:489: thugs kar thugs rdo rje'i ngo bo /
NK040(thi)024:491: de las 'od zer 'phros pas 'og min nas spyan drangs bar bsam /
NK040(thi)024:492: ma h+aa gu ru d+aak+ki sa p+aa ri wa ra
NK040(thi)024:493: badz+ra sa ma ya zhes brjod pas bla ma dang
NK040(thi)024:494: sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' thams cad mdun du
NK040(thi)024:495: byon nas / dza dzah pad+ma pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs par bsam mo //
NK040(thi)024:497: ma h+aa ar+g+ham zhes pa la sogs kyis mchod nas /
NK040(thi)024:498: ma h+aa gu ru am gu sha ya dzah zhes
NK040(thi)024:499: brjod nas nas rang gi thugs ka nas lcags kyu
NK040(thi)024:500: thogs pa dpag tu med pa 'phros pas ye shes
NK040(thi)024:504: badz+ra s+pho ta bam lcags sgrog gis sdom /
NK040(thi)024:505: dril bu thogs pas dbyer med du byas nas /
NK040(thi)024:506: badz+ra g+han+de hoh badz+ra a we sha ya gnyis su med par bsam /
NK040(thi)024:514: la ma ki gos dkar mo /
NK040(thi)024:544: pany+tsa ku la sa p+aa ri wa ra badz+ra sa
NK040(thi)024:545: ma ya dza dzah mdun du byon nas pad+ma ka
NK040(thi)024:546: ma la ye s+t+wam gdan la bzhugs par bsam /
NK040(thi)024:547: na mahsarba ta th+aa ga ta sa p+aa ri w+aa ra ar+g+ham s+w+aa h+aa /
NK040(thi)024:549: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bdag la dbang bskur du gsol /
NK040(thi)024:550: rigs lnga dbang gi lha rnams kyis /
NK040(thi)024:551: ci ltar bltams tsam gyis ni /
NK040(thi)024:552: lha rnams kyis ni khrus gsol ltar /
NK040(thi)024:553: lha yi chu ni dag pa yi /
NK040(thi)024:554: de bzhin bdag gis sku khrus gsol /
NK040(thi)024:555: na mahsarba ta th+aa ga ta a b+hi shi ka te sa ma ya sh+ri ye h'u /
NK040(thi)024:556: zhes gsungs shing dbang bskur bas /
NK040(thi)024:559: lus thams cad gang chu'i lhag ma yar lud pa las /
NK040(thi)024:560: gtso mo la mi bskyod pa gzhan rnams la rigs bzhis dbu brgyan gsungs /
NK040(thi)024:561: yang na mi bskyod pas dbu brgyan /
NK040(thi)024:563: badz+ra a mri ta kun+da li ha na ha na h'u phata /
NK040(thi)024:564: s+w+aa b+h+aa wa stong par gyur /
NK040(thi)024:565: stong pa'i ngang las +aahmh'u gsum las mi mgo'i sgyed pu gsum gyi dbus su /
NK040(thi)024:568: a las thod pa dkar po yangs shing rgya che ba dpral ba rang la bstan pa'i nang du /
NK040(thi)024:569: a las zla ba'i steng du /
NK040(thi)024:570: shar du g+ho las ba glang gi sha /
NK040(thi)024:572: nub tu d+ha las rta'i sha /
NK040(thi)024:573: byang du ha las glang po che'i sha /
NK040(thi)024:574: dbus su na las mi'i sha /
NK040(thi)024:575: de rnams kyi steng du shar du b+h+r+aum las dri chen /
NK040(thi)024:577: nub tu dzam las byang sems /
NK040(thi)024:578: byang du kham las klad pa /
NK040(thi)024:579: dbus su h'u las dri chu /
NK040(thi)024:580: de'i steng du shar du b+h+r+aum las me long lta bu'i ye shes /
NK040(thi)024:581: lhor +aam las mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes /
NK040(thi)024:582: nub tu dzam las so sor rtog pa'i ye shes /
NK040(thi)024:583: byang du kham las bya ba grub pa'i ye shes /
NK040(thi)024:584: dbus su h'u las chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes kyi ngo bo /
NK040(thi)024:585: zla ba'i mthar g.yon skor du /
NK040(thi)024:601: de thams cad kyi steng gi nam mkha' la dkar po mgo mthur du bstan pa'i steng du /
NK040(thi)024:602: zla ba la gnas pa'i sna tshogs rdo rje'i lte
NK040(thi)024:603: ba la h'u gis mtshan pa dang bcas pas thod
NK040(thi)024:605: h'u las 'od zer 'phros pas rlung g.yos me sbar nas thod pa dros /
NK040(thi)024:606: rdzas rnams yi ge dang bcas pa 'od du zhu
NK040(thi)024:607: zhing khol ba'i rlangs pa la phog pas bdud brtsi'i
NK040(thi)024:608: chu rgyun 'dzag h'u la phog pas 'od zer rlangs
NK040(thi)024:609: pa dang bcas pa phyogs bcur 'phros pas /
NK040(thi)024:610: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi thugs
NK040(thi)024:611: ka nas ye shes kyi bdud rtsis gang ba'i thod
NK040(thi)024:612: pa dpag tu med pa spyan drangs /
NK040(thi)024:613: h'u la thim pas ljid kyis sna tshogs rdo rje
NK040(thi)024:614: zla ba dang bcas pa thod pa'i nang du lhung
NK040(thi)024:615: / mer gyi zhu nas ye shes kyi bdud rtsi dang /
NK040(thi)024:616: dam tshig gi bdud rtsi dang gnyis su med par 'dres pas /
NK040(thi)024:617: kha dog dri ro reg bya phun sum tshogs par gyur /
NK040(thi)024:618: ye shes kyi bdud rtsi'i rgya mtsho chen por bsam zhing /
NK040(thi)024:621: ha kha dog phrog par byed /
NK040(thi)024:623: h+r+ai yis nus pa 'joms par byed /
NK040(thi)024:624: na mahsarba ta th+aa ga ta a mri ta badz+ra
NK040(thi)024:625: s+w+aa b+h+aa wa at+ma ko&a bdud rtsi lce la bzhag
NK040(thi)024:626: cing lha thams cad bdud rtsis tshim par bsam /
NK040(thi)024:628: zhes brjod cing g.yon pa'i mtheb srin gyis dkrug cing dar gcig bzhag /
NK040(thi)024:630: ces sogs gdan thog gcig ma nas byung ba ltar gyis bstod do //
NK040(thi)024:633: smra bsam brjod med shes rab pha rol phyin //
NK040(thi)024:635: sems kyi chos nyid gdod ma nas spros pa thams cad dang bral ba yin pas /
NK040(thi)024:636: de'i ngang la sgo gsum ma bcos par sems rtse gcig tu lhod kyis klod la bzhag go //
NK040(thi)024:638: rtag tu snying la gnas pa yis //
NK040(thi)024:639: thig le gcig las 'gyur med pas //
NK040(thi)024:640: de bsgom byed pa'i skyes bu la //
NK040(thi)024:641: nges par ye shes skye bar 'gyur //
NK040(thi)024:645: snying pad+ma ltar gyes pa'i lte bar zla dal sran ma phyed tshal tsam gyi steng du /
NK040(thi)024:646: rang gi sems kyi ngo bo thig le dkar po yungs 'bru tsam 'od kyi rang bzhin can /
NK040(thi)024:649: ngo bo stong par rtse gcig tu rlung kha sbyor bsgom mo //
NK040(thi)024:650: bde stong nyams khyad par can skye /
NK040(thi)024:652: rang lha'i skur gsal ba'i lag par 'phreng ba bzung la /
NK040(thi)024:653: ru tsi ra ma ni pra b+ha d+ha ya h'u /
NK040(thi)024:654: zhes lan bdun bzlas nas phreng ba btab ste bgrangs
NK040(thi)024:655: nas las thams cad 'grub par rgyud de nas gsungs
NK040(thi)024:656: so // lha rnams kyi thugs kar nyi ma la
NK040(thi)024:657: rang rang gi kha dog dang mthun pa'i a'i tha
NK040(thi)024:658: so // mar / rang rang gi sngags kyis bskor ba las 'od zer 'phros /
NK040(thi)024:659: snang srid thams cad kyi don byas /
NK040(thi)024:660: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi
NK040(thi)024:661: byin rlabs thams cad rang la zhugs par bsam zhing
NK040(thi)024:662: / badz+ra d+ha ki ni h'u phata s+w+aa h+aa /
NK040(thi)024:664: bud+d+ha d+ha ki ni h'u sangs rgyas mkha' 'gro /
NK040(thi)024:667: rat+na d+ha ki ni h'u phata s+w+aa h+aa /
NK040(thi)024:668: pad+ma d+ha ki ni h'u pad+ma mkha' 'gro /
NK040(thi)024:670: karma d+ha ki ni h'u las kyi mkha' 'gro /
NK040(thi)024:673: las thams cad 'grub dngos grub myur du 'grub gsungs /
NK040(thi)024:674: par gyur cig s+w+aa h+aa zhes brjod cing /
NK040(thi)024:675: bsnyen pa rkyangs pa yin na /
NK040(thi)024:676: dkyil 'khor rten dang bstan par bcas pa'i dal rang la bsdu /
NK040(thi)024:677: rang gtso bo'i nga rgyal dang ldan pas /
NK040(thi)024:678: bsnyen pa rkyang pa byed na 'di yan chad thun bzhir bcad la thun mjug tu gtor ma 'bul /
NK040(thi)024:680: bsngo ba smon lam btab thun mtshams kyi rnal 'byor dang ma bral bar bya'o //
NK040(thi)024:681: mdun bskyed bsgrub pas bsang sbyang bya /
NK040(thi)024:682: mchod rdzas rnams sngar bdag bskyed kyi skabs ltar byin gyis brlabs /
NK040(thi)024:683: stong pa'i ngang las rdo rje'i sa gzhi dang rigs kyi bdag pos /
NK040(thi)024:684: brgyan pa'i bar bdag bskyed ltar byas la /
NK040(thi)024:685: mdun bskyed byed na dkyil 'khor bsdu mi dgos /
NK040(thi)024:686: gnas mkha' dbyings rnam dag gi pho brang nas //
NK040(thi)024:687: bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro gsum //
NK040(thi)024:688: chos sku longs sku sprul sku gsum //
NK040(thi)024:689: sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun gsum //
NK040(thi)024:690: khyed sangs rgyas byang sems tshogs dang bcas //
NK040(thi)024:692: bzhugs nas dbang bskur byin gyis rlobs //
NK040(thi)024:693: gnas 'og min chos dbyings pho brang nas //
NK040(thi)024:694: yum chen phar phyin man chad dang //
NK040(thi)024:695: rtsa ba'i bla ma yan chad kyi //
NK040(thi)024:696: ma rgyud dpa' mo'i lha tshogs rnams //
NK040(thi)024:697: khyed dpa' bo mkha' 'gro'i tshogs dang bcas //
NK040(thi)024:699: bzhugs nas dbang bskur byin gyis rlobs //
NK040(thi)024:700: gnas bya rgod phung po'i ri bo nas //
NK040(thi)024:701: bcom ldan sh+aakya thub pa man chad dang //
NK040(thi)024:702: rtsa ba'i bla ma yan chad kyi //
NK040(thi)024:703: pha rgyud dpa' bo'i lha tshogs rnams //
NK040(thi)024:704: khyed dpa' bo mkha' 'gro'i tshogs dang bcas //
NK040(thi)024:705: gnas 'dir bzhugs nas bkra shis glang lung gi dgon pa nas //
NK040(thi)024:706: rgyal ba don grub man chad dang //
NK040(thi)024:707: rtsa ba'i bla ma yan chad kyi //
NK040(thi)024:708: sras rgyud nyams myong gi lha tshogs rnams //
NK040(thi)024:709: khyed sde snod rgyud sde'i bla ma rnams //
NK040(thi)024:710: gnas 'dir bzhugs nas gar bzhugs dag pa'i zhing khams nas //
NK040(thi)024:711: pha rtsa ba'i bla ma rdo rje 'chang //
NK040(thi)024:712: khyed bka' brgyud bla ma'i tshogs kyis bskor //
NK040(thi)024:713: gnas 'dir bzhugs nas gnas gnyan sa ri khrod dgon pa nas //
NK040(thi)024:714: grogs snyems thag chod pa sprul pa'i sku //
NK040(thi)024:715: skal ldan pho mo'i tshogs dang bcas //
NK040(thi)024:716: gnas bzhugs nyi shu rtsa bzhi'i gnas mchog nas //
NK040(thi)024:717: yi dam lha tshogs rgyud sde bzhi yi tshogs gnas
NK040(thi)024:718: 'dir bzhugs nas bsil ba tshal gyi dur khrod nas
NK040(thi)024:719: // chos skyong ma mgon lcam dral la //
NK040(thi)024:720: dam can rgya mtsho'i tshogs kyis gnas 'dir spyan 'dren bzhugs su gsol //
NK040(thi)024:721: bzhugs nas dbang bskur byin gyis rlobs //
NK040(thi)024:722: ma h+aa gu ru d+ha ki ni sa p+aa ri
NK040(thi)024:723: w+aa ra badz+ra sa ma ya dza dzah zhes brjod
NK040(thi)024:724: cing rdo rje bsdus pa'i phyag rgya byas pas thams
NK040(thi)024:725: cad mdun du byon par bsam /
NK040(thi)024:726: pad+ma ka ma la ye s+t+wam /
NK040(thi)024:727: ma h+aa gu ru zhes sogs sngon du 'gro ba la sogs pas mchod nas /
NK040(thi)024:728: dzahmh'u bam hoh thams cad yi dam gyi dkyil 'khor du bzhugs par bsam pa ni bsgrub pa'o //
NK040(thi)024:729: yan lag bdun pa rgyas bsdus gang rung ma thogs
NK040(thi)024:730: nas mdun gyi lha tshogs rnams la mchod par bsam
NK040(thi)024:732: ces brjod pas mdun bskyed dang dbyer med par gyur
NK040(thi)024:733: pa la gzhal yas khang dang yo byad rnams 'bul
NK040(thi)024:734: bas rab tu dgyes nas bzhugs par bsam /
NK040(thi)024:735: rang gi thugs ka nas mchod pa'i lha mo grangs med pa rnams spros pas mchod rdzas du /
NK040(thi)024:736: dri med yid du 'ong ba yi //
NK040(thi)024:737: lha rdzas dam pa'i mchod yon 'di //
NK040(thi)024:738: bla ma mkha' 'gro 'khor dang bcas la 'bul //
NK040(thi)024:739: 'gro ba'i don la bzhes su gsol //
NK040(thi)024:740: ma h+aa gu ru d+aak+ki ni sa pa ri w+aa
NK040(thi)024:741: ra ar+g+ham pu tsa me g+ha sa mu dra s+pha
NK040(thi)024:742: ra na sa ma ye h'u /
NK040(thi)024:743: dri med yid du 'ong ba yi //
NK040(thi)024:744: lha rdzas bzang po'i zhabs bsil 'di //
NK040(thi)024:745: bla ma mkha' 'gro 'khor dang bcas la 'bul //
NK040(thi)024:746: 'gro ba'i don la bzhes su gsol //
NK040(thi)024:747: ma h+aa gu ru d+ha ki ni sa p+aa ri
NK040(thi)024:748: w+aa ra pad+yam pu dza me g+ha sa mu dra
NK040(thi)024:749: s+pha ra na sa me ye h'u /
NK040(thi)024:750: dri med yid du 'ong ba yis //
NK040(thi)024:751: lha rdzas bzang po'i me tog 'di //
NK040(thi)024:752: bla ma mkha' 'gro 'khor dang bcas la 'bul //
NK040(thi)024:753: 'gro ba'i don la bzhes su gsol //
NK040(thi)024:754: ma h+aa gu ru d+ha ki ni sa p+aa ri
NK040(thi)024:755: wa ra push+pe pu dza me g+ha sa mu dra
NK040(thi)024:756: s+pha ra na sa me ye h'u /
NK040(thi)024:757: dri med yid du 'ong ba yi //
NK040(thi)024:758: lha rdzas bzang po'i bdug spos 'di //
NK040(thi)024:759: bla ma mkha' 'gro 'gro ba'i ma h+aa gu d+hu
NK040(thi)024:760: pe pu dza dri med yid du 'ong ba yi
NK040(thi)024:761: lha rdzas bzang po'i snang gsal 'di //
NK040(thi)024:762: bla ma mkha' 'gro 'gro ba'i ma h+aa nas /
NK040(thi)024:763: a lo ke pu dri med yid du 'ong ba yi //
NK040(thi)024:764: lha rdzas bzang po'i dri mchog 'di //
NK040(thi)024:765: bla ma mkha' 'gro 'gro ba'i ma h+aa nas /
NK040(thi)024:766: g+han+d+he dri med yid du 'ong ba yi //
NK040(thi)024:767: lha rdzas bzang po'i zhal zas 'di //
NK040(thi)024:768: bla ma 'gro ba'i ma h+aa nas /
NK040(thi)024:769: nee bid+ya lha rdzas bzang po'i rol mo 'di //
NK040(thi)024:770: bla ma 'gro ba'i ma h+aa nas /
NK040(thi)024:771: shap+da pu dza zhes pa dang /
NK040(thi)024:772: g+han+d+he ra ni sngags brjod cing 'dir rol mo 'bul /
NK040(thi)024:773: 'dod yon phun sum tshogs pa nam mkha' dang mnyam
NK040(thi)024:774: par bsnams pa'i gsung rdo rje ma la sogs pas
NK040(thi)024:776: dri med yid du 'ong ba yi //
NK040(thi)024:777: lha rdzas dam pa'i gzugs mchog 'di //
NK040(thi)024:778: bla ma mkha' 'gro 'khor dang bcas la 'bul //
NK040(thi)024:779: 'gro ba'i don la bzhes su gsol //
NK040(thi)024:781: r+au pa ka ma gu na pu dzi ta +aahmh'u /
NK040(thi)024:782: dri med yid du 'ong ba yi //
NK040(thi)024:783: lha rdzas dam pa'i sgra snyan 'di //
NK040(thi)024:784: bla ma mkha' 'gro 'gro ba'i shap+da ka ma dri
NK040(thi)024:785: med yid du lha rdzas dam pa'i dri mchog 'di
NK040(thi)024:786: // bla ma 'gro ba'i g+han+d+he dri med yid du lha rdzas dam pa'i rol mchog 'di //
NK040(thi)024:787: bla ma 'gro ba'i ra sa ka ma dri med lha rdzas dam pa'i reg mchog 'di //
NK040(thi)024:788: bla ma mkha' 'gro 'gro ba'i 'gro ba'i spar+she ka ma gu na pu dzi ta +aahmh'u /
NK040(thi)024:792: mchod do pha drin can rtsa ba'i bla ma /
NK040(thi)024:795: man ngag gnang ba'i bla ma brgyud pa dang bcas pa'i bla ma rnams kyi zhal du +aahmh'u /
NK040(thi)024:796: yum chen mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ma /
NK040(thi)024:803: skyo ston bsod nams bla ma /
NK040(thi)024:804: ma gcig lab kyi sgrol ma /
NK040(thi)024:815: ras pa chos kyi seng ge /
NK040(thi)024:819: rtogs ldan nam mkha' rdo rje /
NK040(thi)024:820: skyes mchog tshul khrims rgyal mtshan /
NK040(thi)024:821: mtshungs med chos kyi rdo rje /
NK040(thi)024:822: mkhas grub dz+ny+aa na ke tu /
NK040(thi)024:824: rang rang so so brgyud pa'i bla ma rnams la 'bul /
NK040(thi)024:826: rgyud sde bzhi'i brgyud pa'i bla ma rnams kyi zhal du +aahmh'u /
NK040(thi)024:827: badz+ra d+hak+ki ni zhes sogs mkha' 'gro sde lnga'i rtsa sngags dang /
NK040(thi)024:828: gzhan yang bla ma yi dam gang yin gyi snying po'i mthar /
NK040(thi)024:830: chos skyong lcam dral la sogs rang rang gi chos skyong gang yin gyi snying po dang /
NK040(thi)024:837: gnas gsum mkha' 'gro dur khrod kyi bdag mo /
NK040(thi)024:840: tshan d+ho nye ba'i tshan d+ho /
NK040(thi)024:842: dur khrod nye ba'i dur khrod /
NK040(thi)024:843: thung gcod nye ba'i thung gcod /
NK040(thi)024:846: yul chen bzhi bcu rtsa bzhi na bzhugs pa'i spral
NK040(thi)024:847: pa dang yang sprul bsam gyis mi khyab pa rnams
NK040(thi)024:848: kyi zhal du mdor na rig pa rgyal po'i tshogs
NK040(thi)024:852: bran gyi tshogs dang bcas pa rnams kyi zhal du lha chen po brgyad /
NK040(thi)024:855: rgyal po chen po sde bzhi /
NK040(thi)024:856: rgyu skar nyi shu rtsa brgyad /
NK040(thi)024:859: 'phrog ma ma bu lnga brgya 'khor dang bcas pa
NK040(thi)024:860: rnams kyi zhal du rgya gar rgya nag li yul
NK040(thi)024:862: bod gangs chen khrod kyi gnas khyad par can la
NK040(thi)024:863: gnas pa'i srung ma rnams kyi zhal du gzhan yang
NK040(thi)024:864: mtha' 'dul gyi gtsug lag khang brgya rtsa brgyad /
NK040(thi)024:865: yang 'dul gyi gtsug lag khang stong rtsa gnyis la gnas pa'i srung ma rnams kyi zhal du /
NK040(thi)024:866: stong gsum gyi 'jig rten gyi khams dang /
NK040(thi)024:868: bod khams skyong ba'i bstan ma bcu gnyis 'khor dang
NK040(thi)024:869: bcas pa rnams kyi zhal du bye brag tu yang
NK040(thi)024:870: sa phyogs yul ris 'di la gnas pa'i gzhi bdag
NK040(thi)024:871: rnams kyi zhal du gzhan yang rigs drug gi sems
NK040(thi)024:872: can thams cad tshim par gyur cig /
NK040(thi)024:874: sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa dar zhing rgyas pa dang /
NK040(thi)024:875: bstan 'dzin rnams sku khams bzang zhing sgrub pa bsam gtan mthar phyin pa dang /
NK040(thi)024:876: sems can rnams bde zhing skyid pa'i phrin las mdzod cig /
NK040(thi)024:877: lha rnams mnyes nas rdo rje'i glu gar byed par bsam zhing /
NK040(thi)024:878: rnam lnga 'dod pa'i phyag rgya bskor zhing /
NK040(thi)024:879: na mahsarba ta th+aa ga ta a mri ta badz+ra s+w+aa b+ha wa at+ma ko&a ham /
NK040(thi)024:882: gru mo'i kha t+w+aam ka yab tu gyur pas yab
NK040(thi)024:883: yum thams cad snyoms par bzhugs pas zag med bde
NK040(thi)024:884: ba'i lhan cig skyes pa'i ye shes kyis tshims par
NK040(thi)024:885: bsam zhing / 'khyud pa'i phyag rgya byas la /
NK040(thi)024:886: na mahsarba ta th+aa ga ta a nu r+aa ga badz+ra swa b+ha wa at+ma ko&a ham /
NK040(thi)024:887: de kho na nyid kyi ni /
NK040(thi)024:888: mchod bya mchod byed mchod tshul gsum rang bzhin med pa la blo mnyam par bzhag go //
NK040(thi)024:890: gang gi drin gyis bde chen nyid /
NK040(thi)024:895: las bum gnyis gcig tu bskyed pa ni /
NK040(thi)024:899: stong pa'i ngang las pam pam las pad+ma /
NK040(thi)024:900: a a las zla ba'i steng du /
NK040(thi)024:901: b+h+r+aum b+h+r+aum las rin po che'i bum pa lto ba yangs shing /
NK040(thi)024:904: dpag bsam shing gi kha rgyan dang /
NK040(thi)024:905: lha'i gos kyis 'gul pa dkris ba /
NK040(thi)024:907: dwangs shing thogs pa med pa /
NK040(thi)024:908: bcud thams kyis yongs su gang ba'i rnam rgyal bum
NK040(thi)024:909: par pad+ma 'dab ma bzhi'i lte ba dang 'dab ma
NK040(thi)024:910: rnams su a las zla ba /
NK040(thi)024:911: ram las nyi ma dang ro'i steng du a las mkha' 'gro sde lnga bdag bskyed ltar bskyed /
NK040(thi)024:913: las bum gyi nang du pad+ma nyi ma'i steng du /
NK040(thi)024:914: h'u las bdud rtsi 'khyil ba sku mdog sngon po /
NK040(thi)024:915: zhal gcig phyag gnyis spyan gsum pa /
NK040(thi)024:916: zhal gdangs shing mche ba brtsigs pa /
NK040(thi)024:917: dbu skra dmar ser gyen du bardzesa pa /
NK040(thi)024:918: phyag g.yas pas sna tshogs rdo rje nam mkhar 'phyar ba /
NK040(thi)024:919: g.yon pas de'i yu ba byas pa'i dril bu 'dzin pa /
NK040(thi)024:920: thugs kar sdigs mdzub mdzad pa /
NK040(thi)024:921: stag lpags rlon pa'i sham thabs can /
NK040(thi)024:922: klu chen po brgyad kyi brgyan pa /
NK040(thi)024:924: g.yon brkyangs pas ye shes kyi me dpung 'bar ba'i dbus na bzhugs pa /
NK040(thi)024:925: gnas gsum gyi byin gyis brlabs /
NK040(thi)024:928: mkha' 'gro sde lnga la mi bskyod pas /
NK040(thi)024:929: bdud rtsi 'khyil pa la don yod grub pas dbu brgyan /
NK040(thi)024:930: ye shes pa spyan 'dren dang mchod pa 'bul ba la sogs bdag bskyed ltar dus gcig bya /
NK040(thi)024:931: rnam rgyal bum pa'i bstod pa ni /
NK040(thi)024:933: las bum gyi bstod pa ni /
NK040(thi)024:934: bdud rtsi 'khyil pa khro bo che /
NK040(thi)024:935: sangs rgyas kun gyi thabs chen po /
NK040(thi)024:936: ma rung thams cad bsgral mdzad pa /
NK040(thi)024:937: srung mdzad lha la phyag 'tshal bstod /
NK040(thi)024:938: mkha' 'gro sde lnga rang gis sngags dang /
NK040(thi)024:939: rang gi thugs ka nas sngags kyi 'phreng ba gzungs thag la bsten nas /
NK040(thi)024:941: sku'i cha thams cad las bdud brtsi'i chu rgyun babs nas bum pa khengs par bsam zhing /
NK040(thi)024:942: sarba ta th+aa ga ta a b+hi shi ka te sa ma ya sh+ri ye h'u /
NK040(thi)024:943: badz+ra a mri ta kun+d+ha l+ai ha na ha na h'u phata /
NK040(thi)024:946: +aahmh'u zhes brjod nang du chos kyi chu blugs pas
NK040(thi)024:947: lha thams cad 'od du zhu ba'i chu nus ldan
NK040(thi)024:948: du bsam / lha dal gyi bya ba ma tshar
NK040(thi)024:949: gyi bar du phrin las mdzad cing bzhugs par mos
NK040(thi)024:950: du bsam / / ma 'byor ba dang nongs pa bzod gsol /
NK040(thi)024:955: gtor ma ni nang nang mchod chu dang chang gi bran la /
NK040(thi)024:957: rang gi thugs kha nas 'od zer 'phros pas 'khor
NK040(thi)024:958: 'das thams cad spyan drangs nas mdun bskyed la thim
NK040(thi)024:959: pas / thams cad bla ma yi dam lha'i ngo
NK040(thi)024:960: bor gyur pa'i zhal nas 'od kyi sbu gu byung
NK040(thi)024:961: nas gtor ma gsol bar bsam zhing /
NK040(thi)024:962: thal mo kha gyen du phyogs zhing /
NK040(thi)024:963: ma h+aa gu ru d+ha ki ni sa p+aa ri
NK040(thi)024:964: w+aa ra i dam b+ha ling+ta kha kha kha hi
NK040(thi)024:967: khams gsum ma lus zhing khams nas /
NK040(thi)024:969: stong gsum bdud rtsis bkang ba'i rdzas gtor ma 'dod yon lnga ru bsngo /
NK040(thi)024:970: ar+g+ham phyi nang gsang ba de kho na nyid kyis mchod /
NK040(thi)024:971: gang gi drin gyis sogs dang /
NK040(thi)024:972: ma chos dbyings zhes sogs kyis bstod /
NK040(thi)024:973: bla ma mkha' 'gro sde lnga'i tshogs //
NK040(thi)024:974: 'dir gshegs bdag la dgongs su gsol //
NK040(thi)024:975: ces sogs brjod cing phrin las gzhol ces pa nas /
NK040(thi)024:977: ces pa'i bar gong gi sngon 'gro gtor ma'i skabs ltar bya /
NK040(thi)024:980: chos skyong rnams la rang gi gtor chog gi bsngo /
NK040(thi)024:982: dam chen rgya mtsho'i tshogs la 'bul nas /
NK040(thi)024:984: 'phrog ma gzhi bdag la bsngosa la bka' bsgo bya /
NK040(thi)024:985: khyad par gyi tshogs la lnga /
NK040(thi)024:986: tshogs kyi yo byad gsog pa /
NK040(thi)024:990: phyi nang gi mkha' 'gro ma rnams tshogs la rol ba'o //
NK040(thi)024:992: der 'dus pa'i rnal 'byor pho mo rnams /
NK040(thi)024:994: nam mkha' sgo 'gyed kyi dmigs pas bem rig phral /
NK040(thi)024:996: ro bsres dang dbyings bsres bsdeb par bya'o //
NK040(thi)024:997: rang gzhan gyi ro che la tsho ba snum zhing yid du 'ong ba /
NK040(thi)024:998: de'i mdun du rang gi rnam shes rje btsun ma
NK040(thi)024:999: dmar mo gri gug dang thod pa 'dzin pa'i gri
NK040(thi)024:1000: gug gis mgo bo rbad rbad lan gsum bcad nas
NK040(thi)024:1002: smin mtshams nas bdud sgo'i bar skad cig gis brag nas /
NK040(thi)024:1003: dpral ba rang la bstan pa /
NK040(thi)024:1004: bskal pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams dang mnyam par gyur pa'i nang du /
NK040(thi)024:1007: rus pa'i gram khrod chen po byang sems dkar dmar gyis bran par bsam /
NK040(thi)024:1008: de dang tshogs kyi rdzas gnyis su med par gyur par bsam /
NK040(thi)024:1009: byin rlabs ni nang mchod ltar byas la /
NK040(thi)024:1011: sngar spyan 'dren pa'i skabs bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro gsum //
NK040(thi)024:1012: zhes sogs ci lta ba bzhin brjod la /
NK040(thi)024:1013: gnas 'dir spyan 'dren sogs kyi mal du /
NK040(thi)024:1014: 'dir gshegs tshogs kyi mchod pa bzhes //
NK040(thi)024:1016: 'og min gnas su byin gyis rlobs //
NK040(thi)024:1017: 'og tu dgongs bskyod ma'i skabs su o rgyan gnas su zhes sogs mchan gong ltar 'don pa bsgyur /
NK040(thi)024:1019: mar me 'di la mdangs shig phyungs //
NK040(thi)024:1021: slob ma rnams la byin gyis rlobs //
NK040(thi)024:1022: dbang bskur na slob ma rnams la dbang bskur ces brjod do //
NK040(thi)024:1023: rin chen la sogs snod rnams kun //
NK040(thi)024:1024: mtshan ldan thod par byin gyis rlobs //
NK040(thi)024:1025: tshogs kyi mchod pa rgya chen 'di //
NK040(thi)024:1026: ye shes bdud brtsir byin gyis rlobs //
NK040(thi)024:1027: zag med kyi bdud rtsir byin gyis rlobs /
NK040(thi)024:1029: dpa' bo mkha' 'gro dpa' mor de nas /
NK040(thi)024:1030: rgyud smin cing grol bar byin gyis rlobs //
NK040(thi)024:1031: rkyen phyi nang gnyis kyi bar chad sol //
NK040(thi)024:1032: mchog thun mong gnyis par bar gyi tshig kha gyur /
NK040(thi)024:1033: kyi dngos grub spro na stsol //
NK040(thi)024:1034: gnas 'og min chos dbyings pho brang nas //
NK040(thi)024:1036: sde snod rgyud sde'i bla ma rnams //
NK040(thi)024:1037: ma yum chen gzugs kyi mchod pa khyad par 'phags //
NK040(thi)024:1040: zhes pa yan chad kyi mtshan gsum po de /
NK040(thi)024:1041: gong ltar tshig kha bsgyur nas brjod //
NK040(thi)024:1042: de nas yum chen thugs las sprul pa'i sras //
NK040(thi)024:1043: zhes sogs dgongs bskyod ma byed /
NK040(thi)024:1044: de nas gar bzhugs dag pa'i zhing khams nas //
NK040(thi)024:1046: dam chen rgya mtsho'i tshogs kyis bskang //
NK040(thi)024:1047: zhes pa yan chad brjod pa las /
NK040(thi)024:1048: khyad par du ma gcig mkha' 'gro sde lnga la tshogs 'bul ba ni /
NK040(thi)024:1049: rnal 'byor pho mo rnams rig pa skye med kyi
NK040(thi)024:1050: ngang nas 'gag med kyi ngang nyams myong dang ldan
NK040(thi)024:1051: pas / d+aa ma ru dang rkang gling la sogs bsgrag cing /
NK040(thi)024:1052: ma gcig jo mo rnal 'byor ma //
NK040(thi)024:1053: pha rol phyin ma'i grub thob ma //
NK040(thi)024:1054: skal ldan kun gyi rgyud grol ma //
NK040(thi)024:1055: gsang sngags kun gyi brgyud 'dzin ma //
NK040(thi)024:1056: dus gsum sangs rgyas gdung 'dzin ma //
NK040(thi)024:1057: ma bdag dang mkha' mnyam sems can la //
NK040(thi)024:1058: thugs rjes dgongs la gnas 'dir gshegs //
NK040(thi)024:1059: tshogs dang gtor ma bzhes su gsol //
NK040(thi)024:1062: ma skyes ba dma' la dgongs pa mtho //
NK040(thi)024:1063: sku lus chung la gzi brjid che //
NK040(thi)024:1065: kun dang mthun pa'i spyod pa can //
NK040(thi)024:1066: ma bdag dang mkha' mnyam sems can la //
NK040(thi)024:1068: ma ser sna med pa'i don rtogs nas //
NK040(thi)024:1069: kun khyab kyi sbyin pa blos theng ma //
NK040(thi)024:1070: rang sems ye shes don rtogs nas //
NK040(thi)024:1071: nyams pa med pa'i khrims bsrung ma //
NK040(thi)024:1072: bdag gzhan med pa'i don rtogs nas //
NK040(thi)024:1073: skye med bzod pa bsgom mdzad ma //
NK040(thi)024:1074: bya btsal med pa'i don rtogs nas //
NK040(thi)024:1076: yeng ba med pa'i don rtogs shing //
NK040(thi)024:1077: yengs med bsam gtan bsgom mdzad ma //
NK040(thi)024:1079: bdag med rtogs pa'i shes rab can //
NK040(thi)024:1080: ma bdag dang mkha' mnyam sogs sngar bzhin /
NK040(thi)024:1081: ma dgongs pa shar du bskyed tsam na //
NK040(thi)024:1082: don 'gyur ba med pa'i nyams dang ldan //
NK040(thi)024:1084: sku mdog sngon mo gzi mdangs can //
NK040(thi)024:1085: ma byin rlabs kyi na bun 'thibs se 'thib //
NK040(thi)024:1086: gdams ngag gi sbrang char si li li //
NK040(thi)024:1087: nyams myong gi mgur ma 'u ru ru //
NK040(thi)024:1088: rus pa'i rgyan cha khra la la //
NK040(thi)024:1089: zhabs kyi bro brdung khrigs se khrig /
NK040(thi)024:1090: phata kyi brda' skad sang se sang //
NK040(thi)024:1091: zhes tshig rkang drug po 'di phyogs bzhi dbus dang lnga la sbyar /
NK040(thi)024:1092: ma dgongs pa lho ru bskyod tsam na //
NK040(thi)024:1093: yon tan rdzogs pa'i nyams dang ldan //
NK040(thi)024:1095: sku mdog ser mo gzi mdangs can //
NK040(thi)024:1097: ma dgongs pa nub tu bskyed tsam na //
NK040(thi)024:1098: don gdod nas dag pa'i nyams dang ldan //
NK040(thi)024:1100: sku mdog dmar mo gzi mdangs can //
NK040(thi)024:1102: ma dgongs pa byang du bskyod tsam na //
NK040(thi)024:1103: don phrin las grub pa'i nyams dang ldan //
NK040(thi)024:1105: sku mdog ljang mo gzi mdangs can //
NK040(thi)024:1107: ma dgongs pa dbus su bskyed tsam na //
NK040(thi)024:1108: don skye 'gag med pa'i nyams dang ldan //
NK040(thi)024:1110: sku mdog dkar mo gzi dmangs can //
NK040(thi)024:1112: ma gnyan sa ri khrod 'grim tsa na //
NK040(thi)024:1113: gnad kyi gdams pa sha ra ra //
NK040(thi)024:1114: bdud kyi gcod thabs si li li //
NK040(thi)024:1115: mkha' 'gro mang po dpungs se dpung //
NK040(thi)024:1116: ma bdag dang man chad sngar dang 'dra /
NK040(thi)024:1117: ma g.ya' ri gangs ri 'grim tsa na //
NK040(thi)024:1118: lta ba'i 'brug sgra di ri ri //
NK040(thi)024:1119: sgom pa'i glog dmar khyugs se khyug /
NK040(thi)024:1120: spyod pa'i thog mda' sha ra ra //
NK040(thi)024:1121: 'bras bu'i char rgyun si li li //
NK040(thi)024:1122: dar gyi cod pan pu ru ru //
NK040(thi)024:1123: mi rkang gi gling bu kyu ru ru //
NK040(thi)024:1124: b+han+d+ha cang tel khra la la //
NK040(thi)024:1125: dril bu g.yer ka si li li //
NK040(thi)024:1126: glu len gar byed khyugs se khyug /
NK040(thi)024:1127: steng der lha tshogs thibs se thib //
NK040(thi)024:1128: 'og der gdon tshogs mya la la //
NK040(thi)024:1129: bar der d+ha ki shigs se shig /
NK040(thi)024:1131: phyi gnyis 'dzin gyi lta ba phya la la //
NK040(thi)024:1132: nang gnyis med kyi rtogs pa khra la la //
NK040(thi)024:1133: bar gzung 'dzin gyi rgya mdud shigs se shig /
NK040(thi)024:1134: thugs 'od gsal chos sku ya la la //
NK040(thi)024:1135: don bde stong rgyud la si li li //
NK040(thi)024:1136: phata kyi brda' skad sangs se sang //
NK040(thi)024:1137: ma bdag dang man chad sngar 'dra /
NK040(thi)024:1138: ma la las chos kyi g+han+di brdung //
NK040(thi)024:1139: ma la las chos kyi bgro gleng byed //
NK040(thi)024:1140: ma la las skye med ngang du bzhugs //
NK040(thi)024:1141: ma la las sgrub brgyud spyod pa mdzad //
NK040(thi)024:1142: ma la las brtul zhugs spyod pa mdzad //
NK040(thi)024:1143: ma la las 'dod yon gyi mchod pa 'bul //
NK040(thi)024:1144: ma la las tshogs kyi 'khor lo bskor //
NK040(thi)024:1145: ma la las mi rkang gi gling bu 'bud //
NK040(thi)024:1146: ma la las d+aa ru cang tel dkrol //
NK040(thi)024:1147: ma la las sha chen dud pa gtong //
NK040(thi)024:1148: ma la las tshil chen gyi sgron me sbar //
NK040(thi)024:1149: dgongs bskyod ma 'di gal che na min pa mi bskul /
NK040(thi)024:1150: gcod dbang mi thob pa'i sar mi bya /
NK040(thi)024:1151: byas na mkha' 'gro'i chad pa 'byung bar gsungs /
NK040(thi)024:1152: ma bdag dang mkha' mnyams sems can rnams //
NK040(thi)024:1153: gzugs kyi mchod pa khyad par 'phags //
NK040(thi)024:1155: kun kyang sangs rgyas thob par shog /
NK040(thi)024:1158: gzugs kyi mchod pa khyad par 'phags //
NK040(thi)024:1159: zhes pa man chad gzhung bsrang ngo //
NK040(thi)024:1163: gro shog la gzugs byas pa'i snying khar tri bris /
NK040(thi)024:1164: rang dang mdun bskyed kyi thugs ka nas 'od zer lcags kyu lta bu 'phros pas /
NK040(thi)024:1165: kho gar gnas pa rang dbang med par bkug par bsam zhing /
NK040(thi)024:1166: 'dod pa'i rgyal po'i phyag rgya bcas la rig pa ngar bskyed la 'di skad do //
NK040(thi)024:1167: na mo rje btsun dam rtsa ba dang brgyud par
NK040(thi)024:1168: bcas pa'i bla ma rnams kyi bka' bden pa dang
NK040(thi)024:1169: / pha brgyud dpa' bo ma brgyud dpa' mo /
NK040(thi)024:1170: sras brgyud nyams myong gi lha tshogs ste gcod yul
NK040(thi)024:1171: brgyud pa'i bla ma rnams bka' sdod dam pa chos
NK040(thi)024:1172: skyong ba'i srung ma chos nyid rnam par dag pa'i
NK040(thi)024:1173: bden pa chen po rnams kyi bden pa'i mthu dang
NK040(thi)024:1174: / thugs rje rnam par dag pa'i bden pas /
NK040(thi)024:1177: dam tshig can gyi sdang dgra /
NK040(thi)024:1178: chos mdzad sgrub pa po rnams kyi sgrub pa dang bsod nams la bar du gcod par byed pa /
NK040(thi)024:1179: sems can yongs la gnod 'tshe byed pa rnams dang /
NK040(thi)024:1180: khyad par du che ge mo'i khyim sgo lam srang
NK040(thi)024:1181: du mi nor zas gsum la gnod cing 'tshe bar
NK040(thi)024:1182: byed pa bar du bcad pa gang yin pa de
NK040(thi)024:1183: dag thams cad / khams gsum rigs drug skye gnas
NK040(thi)024:1184: bzhi gar gnas kyang skad cig la gzugs ling+ga 'di
NK040(thi)024:1186: de dag gi bden pas bkug la gzugs la thim par bsam zhing /
NK040(thi)024:1187: badz+ra d+aak+ki ni h'u dzah mkha' 'gro bzhi phyir tshogs pas phyogs bcur spros nas bkug par bsam zhing /
NK040(thi)024:1188: h'u yum chen thugs kyi sprul pa las //
NK040(thi)024:1189: phyogs bzhi mtshams brgyad steng 'og gnyis dang bcu'i //
NK040(thi)024:1190: phyogs rnams kun nas dgra dang bgegs bkug ma //
NK040(thi)024:1192: sku mdog sna tshogs gzi mdangs can //
NK040(thi)024:1194: mkha' 'gro mang po bran du bkol //
NK040(thi)024:1195: mkha' 'gro mang po sa ltar g.yo //
NK040(thi)024:1199: g.yas pas mtshon cha sna tshogs bsnams //
NK040(thi)024:1200: g.yon pa b+han+d+ha khrag bkang gsol //
NK040(thi)024:1201: dgra bgegs snying nas drangs shing khug /
NK040(thi)024:1202: rings par khug la myur du sgrol //
NK040(thi)024:1203: dam nyams las ngan sdig can 'di //
NK040(thi)024:1204: byang bu dkar la bris pa 'di //
NK040(thi)024:1206: ming dang rus nas smos pa 'di //
NK040(thi)024:1207: nam mkha'i dbyings na gnas kyang rung //
NK040(thi)024:1208: nam mkha'i dbyings nas khug la shog /
NK040(thi)024:1209: rgyal mtsho'i gting nas gnas kyang rung //
NK040(thi)024:1210: rgyal mtsho'i gting nas khug la shog /
NK040(thi)024:1211: gangs ri'i rtse na gnas kyang rung //
NK040(thi)024:1212: gangs ri'i rtse nas khug la shog /
NK040(thi)024:1213: chu bo'i gzhung na gnas kyang rung //
NK040(thi)024:1214: chu bo'i gzhung nas khug la shog /
NK040(thi)024:1215: brag dmar logs la gnas gyur kyang //
NK040(thi)024:1216: brag dmar logs nas khug la shog /
NK040(thi)024:1217: rtsi shing nags tshal gseb nas khug la shog /
NK040(thi)024:1218: las kyi rlung dmar drag pos rgyab nas 'phul //
NK040(thi)024:1219: 'jig byed lcags kyus snying nas drongs //
NK040(thi)024:1220: gnam gyi 'ju thag chod la zhog /
NK040(thi)024:1221: sa yi rten phur phud la shog /
NK040(thi)024:1223: byang bu 'di la myur du skyon //
NK040(thi)024:1224: rings par khug la myur du sgrol //
NK040(thi)024:1225: rtags dang mtshan ma da lta ston //
NK040(thi)024:1226: ces sgo ma bzhi'i sngags brjod cing /
NK040(thi)024:1227: dgug gzhugs byed cing dbang du bya /
NK040(thi)024:1228: rgyas par spro na yum chen la mkha' 'gro so so grangs med par spros nas /
NK040(thi)024:1229: de dag bkug par bsam zhing /
NK040(thi)024:1231: yum chen thugs kyi sprul pa las //
NK040(thi)024:1232: zhes pas phyogs bzhi kun la sbyar /
NK040(thi)024:1233: shar gyi phyogs nas dgra dang bgegs bkug ma //
NK040(thi)024:1234: rdo rje rigs kyi mkha' 'gro ma //
NK040(thi)024:1235: sku mdog sngon mo gzi brjid 'bar //
NK040(thi)024:1236: g.yas pas lcags kyi gri gug bsnams //
NK040(thi)024:1237: g.yon pas b+han+d+ha bdud bzhi khrag bkang bsnams sogs /
NK040(thi)024:1238: lho yi phyogs nas dgra dang bgegs bkug ma //
NK040(thi)024:1239: rin chen rigs kyi mkha' 'gro ma //
NK040(thi)024:1240: sku mdog ser mo gzi brjid 'bar //
NK040(thi)024:1241: g.yas pas gser gyi gri gug bsnams //
NK040(thi)024:1242: g.yon pas b+han+d+ha bdud bzhi'i khrag bkang bsnams //
NK040(thi)024:1243: nub kyi phyogs nas dgra dang bgegs bkug ma //
NK040(thi)024:1245: sku mdog dmar mo gzi brjid 'bar //
NK040(thi)024:1246: g.yas pas zangs kyi gri gug bsnams //
NK040(thi)024:1247: g.yon pas b+han+d+ha bdud bzhi'i khrag bkang bsnams //
NK040(thi)024:1248: byang gi phyogs nas dgra dang bgegs bkug ma //
NK040(thi)024:1249: las kyi rigs kyi mkha' 'gro ma //
NK040(thi)024:1250: sku dmog ljang mo gzi brjid 'bar //
NK040(thi)024:1251: g.yas pas ral gri 'bar ba bsnams //
NK040(thi)024:1252: g.yon pas b+han+d+ha bdud bzhi'i khrag bkang bsnams //
NK040(thi)024:1254: kho lha dang dbye ba ni /
NK040(thi)024:1255: h'u nga yis ma nyes kho yis nyes //
NK040(thi)024:1256: nga ni ma nyes ma gayo'o //
NK040(thi)024:1257: dkon mchog gsum gyis gzu dpang mdzod //
NK040(thi)024:1258: dam nyams las ngan sdig can 'di //
NK040(thi)024:1259: bla ma rnams kyi sku la bsdos //
NK040(thi)024:1260: bla ma rnams dang phyes la shog /
NK040(thi)024:1262: dkon mchog dang phyes la shog /
NK040(thi)024:1263: yi dam lha la 'di yis bsdos //
NK040(thi)024:1264: yi dam lha dang phyes la shog /
NK040(thi)024:1265: chos skyong srung ma rnams la 'di chos skyong srung
NK040(thi)024:1266: ma rnams dang phyes 'go ba'i lha la 'di yis
NK040(thi)024:1267: 'go ba'i lha dang phyes skyob pa'i lha la 'di
NK040(thi)024:1268: skyob pa'i lha dang pha mes brgyud kyi lha la
NK040(thi)024:1269: pha mes brgyud kyi lha dang le'u'i lha la 'di
NK040(thi)024:1270: le'u'i lha dang phyes ma lha zhang lha rnams la
NK040(thi)024:1271: 'di ma lha zhang lha rnams dang phrol //
NK040(thi)024:1272: yum lha bzhi bdag rnams la 'di yis bsdos //
NK040(thi)024:1273: yul lha gzhi bdag rnams dang phyes la shog /
NK040(thi)024:1274: ces brjod cing 'go ba'i lha dang skyob pa'i lha dang 'phral /
NK040(thi)024:1276: nang mchod gtor zhing a mri tas bsang /
NK040(thi)024:1278: stong pa'i ngang las pam las pad+ma /
NK040(thi)024:1279: ram las nyi ma'i steng du /
NK040(thi)024:1280: a yig sngon mo las 'od zer 'phros /
NK040(thi)024:1283: tshur 'dus yongs su gyur pa las /
NK040(thi)024:1284: sku stod khros ma nag mo zhal gcig phyag gnyis spyan gsum ma /
NK040(thi)024:1286: spyi bo na phag zhal nag po thon pa /
NK040(thi)024:1287: khams gsum dbang du sdud pa /
NK040(thi)024:1288: srid gsum zil gyis gnon pa /
NK040(thi)024:1289: nus pa'i ngur sgra drag po sgrogs pa /
NK040(thi)024:1290: g.yas pas rdo rjes yu ba byas pa'i gri gug nam mkhar 'phyar ba /
NK040(thi)024:1291: g.yon pas bdud bzhi'i khrag gis bkang ba'i thod pa thugs kar 'dzin pa /
NK040(thi)024:1292: sku smad gnam lcags kyi phur pa zur gsum pa /
NK040(thi)024:1293: rno ba'i ngar dang ldan pa /
NK040(thi)024:1294: dgra bgegs bsgral ba'i nus mthu phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan pa /
NK040(thi)024:1295: de yi dpral bar la sogs gnas gsum byin gyis rlobs /
NK040(thi)024:1296: phur pa bskyed mchog 'di mdun bskyed kyi skabs su bya ste /
NK040(thi)024:1297: de yang dang po mdun bskyed kyi dam tshig pa bskyed /
NK040(thi)024:1298: de nas phur pa'i dam tshig pa bskyed /
NK040(thi)024:1299: de nas spyan 'dren mchod bstod la sogs dus gcig thun mong du bya'o //
NK040(thi)024:1301: gong du bskyed pa'i phur pa'am /
NK040(thi)024:1304: dam nyams las ngan sdig can 'di //
NK040(thi)024:1305: dbang po rnam lnga mgo la tshang //
NK040(thi)024:1306: klad pa'i dkyil du k+ai la ya //
NK040(thi)024:1308: lta bar byed pa mig yin te //
NK040(thi)024:1309: mig gi g.yas g.yon k+aa la ya //
NK040(thi)024:1310: dam nyams nyan par byed pa rna ba yin //
NK040(thi)024:1311: rna ba g.yas g.yon k+ai la ya //
NK040(thi)024:1312: dam nyams snom par byed pa sna yin te //
NK040(thi)024:1313: sna yi dkyil du dam nyams myong bar byed pa lce yin te //
NK040(thi)024:1314: lce yi dkyil du dam nyams snyab par byed pa lag pa yin //
NK040(thi)024:1315: sog pa g.yas g.yon dam nyams 'gro ba byed pa rkang pa yin //
NK040(thi)024:1316: barla rtsa g.yas g.yon dam nyams 'khor bar byed pa gsang gnas te //
NK040(thi)024:1317: gsang ba'i gnas su dam nyams skyed par byed pa lte ba yin //
NK040(thi)024:1318: lte ba'i dkyil du k+ai la ya //
NK040(thi)024:1319: dam nyams bsam par byed pa snying yin te //
NK040(thi)024:1320: tsit+ta'i dkyil du k+ai la ya //
NK040(thi)024:1321: badz+ra ki li k+ai la ya sarba biga nan bam h'u phata /
NK040(thi)024:1323: zhes brjod nas snying dkar nag mtshams su brgyab pas /
NK040(thi)024:1324: bem rig 'phral nas rnam par shes pa spar /
NK040(thi)024:1325: ling ro de la +aahmh'u gi zag med ye shes kyi bdud rtsir byin gyis brlabs nas /
NK040(thi)024:1326: dmigs pas tshogs dang dbyer med du gyur par dmigs la /
NK040(thi)024:1327: tshogs zan dang chos skyong gtor ma rnams nad pa'i steng du bzhag nas /
NK040(thi)024:1328: rnal 'byor pho mo rnams kyis bteg la dmigs pa gsal pos bstab pa byed de /
NK040(thi)024:1329: h'u bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro gsum //
NK040(thi)024:1330: rang rang gnas nas sku yar bzhengs //
NK040(thi)024:1331: nam mkha' tsam gyi zhal tshur phyes //
NK040(thi)024:1332: glog dmar tsam gyi ljags tshur rkyongs //
NK040(thi)024:1333: gangs ri tsam gyi mche ba gtsigs //
NK040(thi)024:1334: nyi zla tsam gyi spyan yar phyes //
NK040(thi)024:1335: dgra bgegs bsgral ba'i sha khrag rus //
NK040(thi)024:1336: 'dod yon rnam pa lnga ru sprul //
NK040(thi)024:1337: zag med bdud rtsir byin gyis brlabs //
NK040(thi)024:1338: stong gsum bdud rtsis bkang ba 'di //
NK040(thi)024:1339: zhal du bstab bo kha ram kh+aa hi //
NK040(thi)024:1340: mgul du bstim mo a ra li //
NK040(thi)024:1341: lhag ma med par bzhengs su gsol //
NK040(thi)024:1342: yum chen pha brgyud ma brgyud sras brgyud rnams //
NK040(thi)024:1343: dpa' bo mkha' 'gro'i tshogs dang bcas //
NK040(thi)024:1344: rang rang gnas nas sku yar bzhengs //
NK040(thi)024:1346: drug pa rdo rje 'chang chen man chad dang //
NK040(thi)024:1347: yi dam lha tshogs yan chad //
NK040(thi)024:1348: rgyud sde bzhi yi lha tshogs rnams //
NK040(thi)024:1349: rang rang gnas nas sku yar bzhengs //
NK040(thi)024:1351: chos skyong ma mgon lcam dral man chad dang //
NK040(thi)024:1352: zhing skyong las mkhan yan chad du //
NK040(thi)024:1353: bstan srung gnyan po 'khor bcas rnams //
NK040(thi)024:1354: rang rang gnas kun tu bzang po man chad dang //
NK040(thi)024:1355: 'jag ma'i srin bu yan chad du //
NK040(thi)024:1357: rang rang gnas khyad par 'di na gnas pa yi //
NK040(thi)024:1358: ri dbang rgyal po thams cad dang //
NK040(thi)024:1359: mtsho sman rgyal mo la sogs pa'i //
NK040(thi)024:1360: snang zhing srid pa'i lha 'dre rnams //
NK040(thi)024:1361: rang rang gnas nas sku yar bzhengs //
NK040(thi)024:1362: gzugs kyi mchod pa khyad par 'phags //
NK040(thi)024:1363: sgra yi mchod pa yid 'ong ldan //
NK040(thi)024:1364: dri yi mchod pas tshim par mchod //
NK040(thi)024:1365: ro yi mchod pa ro mchog ldan //
NK040(thi)024:1366: reg bya'i mchod pa bla na med //
NK040(thi)024:1367: mchod pa rnam pa lnga rnams kyis //
NK040(thi)024:1368: rab 'byams rgya mtsho yongs bkang nas //
NK040(thi)024:1369: bla ma yi dam lha la 'bul //
NK040(thi)024:1370: bla ma dkon mchog mchod pas mnyes gyur cig /
NK040(thi)024:1371: mkha' 'gro chos skyong thugs dam bskang gyur cig /
NK040(thi)024:1372: rigs drug 'dod pa tshim gyur cig /
NK040(thi)024:1373: bu lon lan chags byang gyur cig /
NK040(thi)024:1374: sha 'khon thams cad bral gyur cig /
NK040(thi)024:1375: bsam pa bzhin du 'grub gyur cig /
NK040(thi)024:1376: bsngosa pa bzhin du tshim gyur cig /
NK040(thi)024:1377: re ba bzhin du bskang gyur cig /
NK040(thi)024:1378: kun kyang sangs rgyas thob par shog /
NK040(thi)024:1379: phyi'i dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma rnams tshogs la rol ba ni /
NK040(thi)024:1380: bsgral mchod kyi skabs su brjod pa'i tshig gong ma rnams ji lta ba bzhin brjod la /
NK040(thi)024:1381: rang rang gnas nas mi zer bar /
NK040(thi)024:1382: 'dir gshegs tshogs dang gtor ma rol //
NK040(thi)024:1384: nam mkha' gang ba'i tshogs 'di rol //
NK040(thi)024:1386: lhag la dgyes pa lhag la rol //
NK040(thi)024:1387: ces pa yan chad kyi bar dang /
NK040(thi)024:1389: tshigs kha bsgyur cing bsres nas brjod par bya'o //
NK040(thi)024:1390: nam mkha' gang ba'i tshogs 'di rol //
NK040(thi)024:1391: bar snang gang ba'i tshogs 'di rol //
NK040(thi)024:1392: sa gzhi gang ba'i tshogs stong gsum gang ba'i tshogs
NK040(thi)024:1393: phyi snod 'jig rten gang ba'i nang bcud 'dod yon
NK040(thi)024:1394: tshogs skye ba med pa'i 'gag pa med pa'i skye
NK040(thi)024:1395: 'gag bral ba'i chos kyi dbyings kyi tshogs la las
NK040(thi)024:1397: la las nang gi tshogs la rol //
NK040(thi)024:1398: la las gsang ba'i tshogs la rol //
NK040(thi)024:1399: tshogs la dgyes pas tshogs la rol //
NK040(thi)024:1400: phud la dgyes pa phud la rol //
NK040(thi)024:1401: lhag la dgyes pa lhag la rol //
NK040(thi)024:1402: spros pa la dga' na gzugs kyi mchod pa khyad pa 'phags //
NK040(thi)024:1405: dman pa'i yul las rab 'das shing //
NK040(thi)024:1406: rgyal ba kun gyi dam tshig mchog /
NK040(thi)024:1407: dngos grub kun gyi gzhir gyur pa //
NK040(thi)024:1408: bdud brtsi mchog gis mchod par bgyi //
NK040(thi)024:1409: sgrib pa'i dri ma kun bsal nas //
NK040(thi)024:1410: rtog pa kun las rnam grol bas //
NK040(thi)024:1411: bla na med pa'i byang chub sems //
NK040(thi)024:1412: bde ba chen pos mnyes gyur cig /
NK040(thi)024:1415: gtor ma'i mgron la rang rang gi gtor sngags kyis 'bum la phyi'i lha rnams tshim par bya'o //
NK040(thi)024:1416: nang gi dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma rnams tshogs la rol ba ni /
NK040(thi)024:1418: rnal 'byor pho mo rnams ra ro ba dang /
NK040(thi)024:1419: bag med pa'i spyod pa spangs la /
NK040(thi)024:1420: kha zas kyi rnal 'byor dang ldan pas tshogs la longs spyod do //
NK040(thi)024:1421: nang gi lha tshogs rnams so sor tshim par byas la /
NK040(thi)024:1425: lhag ma sngar ma btang na /
NK040(thi)024:1426: lhag ma chang dang kha phrus gdab /
NK040(thi)024:1427: swa b+h+aa was stong par sbyangs /
NK040(thi)024:1428: b+h+r+aum las rin che'i snod kyi nang du a ka
NK040(thi)024:1429: ros bdud rtsi 'dod yon longs spyod phun sum tshogs
NK040(thi)024:1432: srid gsum b+han+d+ha 'bar ba'i gzhal yas nas //
NK040(thi)024:1433: lhag ma'i phung po gling bzhi ri rab tsam //
NK040(thi)024:1434: 'dod chags khrag gi rgya mtsho kyi li li //
NK040(thi)024:1435: zhe sdang rus pa'i phung po khra la la //
NK040(thi)024:1436: gti mug sha yi lhu dum nyi li li //
NK040(thi)024:1437: bdud rtsi lnga yi longs spyod bsam mi khyab //
NK040(thi)024:1438: 'khor du gtogs pa'i d+ha ki dam can dang //
NK040(thi)024:1439: sdong grogs byed pa'i lha srin sde brgyad dang //
NK040(thi)024:1440: phyi nang bgegs rigs stong phrag brgyad cu'i tshogs //
NK040(thi)024:1441: bka' yi pha 'bab gtor ma 'dir bzhes la //
NK040(thi)024:1442: ci ltar bcol pa'i phrin las grub par mdzod //
NK040(thi)024:1443: u tsish+tha b+ha lim ta b+hak+sha si s+w+aa h+aa /
NK040(thi)024:1444: lhag ma la dbang ba'i 'byung po nam mkha'i mtha'
NK040(thi)024:1445: dang mnyams pa'i sems can thams cad tshim par gyur
NK040(thi)024:1447: bshal chu bdud rtsi'i rgya mtshor bskyed la /
NK040(thi)024:1449: dgung sngon gangs ri'i g.ya' rtse na //
NK040(thi)024:1450: spang ljongs nags dang skye mo'i tshal //
NK040(thi)024:1451: mtsho dang ne'u seng dag la gnas pa yi //
NK040(thi)024:1452: sman mo bzhi dang bdud mo bzhi //
NK040(thi)024:1453: gnod sbyin chen mo bzhi la sogs pa yi //
NK040(thi)024:1454: bod khams skyong ba'i brtan ma rnams //
NK040(thi)024:1455: lhab lhub mang po'i rgyan dang bcas //
NK040(thi)024:1456: bran g.yogs mang po'i 'khor dang bcas //
NK040(thi)024:1457: 'dir gshegs dam bskang phrin las mdzod //
NK040(thi)024:1458: ces nam mkha' la dor ro //
NK040(thi)024:1459: de nas sngar ltar mchod pa byin rlabs dang /
NK040(thi)024:1460: mdun bskyed skad cig gis gsal btab /
NK040(thi)024:1461: phyi nang gsang ba'i mchod pa la sngags kyis mchod nas /
NK040(thi)024:1462: chos dbyings rnam par dag pas bstod /
NK040(thi)024:1464: 'dod pa'i don la gsol ba gdab /
NK040(thi)024:1465: yi ge brgya pas lhag chad kha bskang /
NK040(thi)024:1467: gang yang bdag blo gti mug pas //
NK040(thi)024:1471: mdun bskyed kyi ye shes pa gshegs //
NK040(thi)024:1472: dam tshig pa bdag la bsdu //
NK040(thi)024:1473: rten yod na rten bzhugs byas pas rab tu gnas pas rab gnas mchog tu 'gyur ro //
NK040(thi)024:1475: gnas gsum bsrungs la spyod lam gyi rnal 'byor la 'jug par bya'o //
NK040(thi)024:1476: rgyun du nyams su len par 'dod pas tshogs las dang 'brel na de ltar yin la /
NK040(thi)024:1489: ma snang zhing srid pa'i skye 'gro kun //
NK040(thi)024:1490: tshogs gnyis dga' bdes tshims byas nas //
NK040(thi)024:1491: zag med sku bzhi'i dpal thob phyir //
NK040(thi)024:1493: nongs gyur mkha' 'gros bzod mdzod cig /
NK040(thi)024:1494: brtse bas rjes su bzung ba dang //
NK040(thi)024:1495: chos 'di phyogs rnams ma lus par //
NK040(thi)024:1496: dar zhing rgyas par mdzad du gsol //
NK040(thi)024:1498: 'di ni 'dor pa kun dga' dpal ba zhes bya bas mdzad pa yin 'dug /
NK040(thi)024:1499: kahthoga pa'i kun dga' 'bum pa dang 'di gnyis gcig yin par nges mtshan gyi rnam grangs tsam mo //
NK040(thi)024:1500: don du kahthog pa'i kun dga' 'bum pa'i gcod gzhung
NK040(thi)024:1501: gi mkha' 'gro sde lnga'i las byang ni 'di ka
